member.summary: Returns information for the current user. If you wish to run the application with the current Windows user credentials, call My.User.InitializeWithWindowsUser().

Still learning about this. Display sub total, tax, and total below list box Make sperate tabs for item categories
To Do Backend: Store list of selected Items in a List(Of Item) Send orders to database
Other Notes: The logic for the event handlers on MainWindow should be in POSApp. Extra Functionality - Make it store menu in XML so that it can run without db connection.
